channel.title: IBM on Stark Tecnology
channel.description: Recent content in IBM on Stark Tecnology

item.title: FlashSystem Cyber ​​Vault, IBM's new solution will accelerate data recovery after Ransomware
item.description: IBM presented its new Flash storage solutions, developed to help companies detect and recover “more quickly” from ransomware and cyberattacks. This was announced by IBM in a statement.
